sentences.sContent: Oh I forgot... .this is just a fairytale!
sentences.sContent_eng: Oh I forgot... .this is just a fairytale!
sentences.sCn: 哦，我忘了... 这仅仅是一个童话故事！

sentences.sContent: After a whirlwind courtship and a fairytale wedding the couple had settled down to an urban lifestyle.
sentences.sContent_eng: After a whirlwind courtship and a fairytale wedding the couple had settled down to an urban lifestyle.
sentences.sCn: 在一段旋风般的热恋和一个童话式的婚礼之后，夫妻俩定居下来，过起了都市生活。

sentences.sContent: That was sold as a fairytale wedding, but from the point of view of most of the public, it turned out to be one of those fairytales that don't have a happy ending.
sentences.sContent_eng: That was sold as a fairytale wedding, but from the point of view of most of the public, it turned out to be one of those fairytales that don't have a happy ending.
sentences.sCn: 那是当作童话式的婚礼推销的，但是从对大部分市民的角度来看，它最终是变成了那些没有幸福结局的童话故事之一。
